subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Safety Antrel Rolle’s comments the day after the Giants lost to the Colts did not produce much reaction from his teammates, and Coach Tom Coughlin mildly disputed Rolle’s remarks.
snippet: Safety Antrel Rolle’s comments the day after the Giants lost to the Colts did not produce much reaction from his teammates, and Coach Tom Coughlin mildly disputed Rolle’s remarks.
